hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select EOTE.EOTE_ID as EOOX_ID, EOTE.CREATOR as CREATOR, EOTE.CREATE_TIME as CREATE_TIME, EOTE.MODIFIER as MODIFIER, EOTE.MODIFY_TIME as MODIFY_TIME, EOTE.REC_VER as REC_VER, EOTE.REC_STATUS as REC_STATUS, EOTE.ORG_ID as ORG_ID, EOTE.EOTE_MODULE_CODE as EOOX_MODULE_CODE, EOTE.EOTE_MODULE_NAME as EOOX_MODULE_NAME, EOTE.EOTE_MODULE_TYPE_CODE as EOOX_MODULE_TYPE_CODE, EOTE.EOTE_MODULE_TYPE_NAME as EOOX_MODULE_TYPE_NAME, EOTE.EOTE_TAB_SEQUENCE as EOOX_TAB_SEQUENCE, EOTE.EOTE_TAB_CODE as EOOX_TAB_CODE, EOTE.EOTE_TAB_NAME as EOOX_TAB_NAME, EOTE.EOTE_TAB_NAME_EN as EOOX_TAB_NAME_EN, EOTE.EOTE_FIELD_ROW as EOOX_FIELD_ROW, EOTE.EOTE_FIELD_COLUMN as EOOX_FIELD_COLUMN, EOTE.EOTE_FIELD_CODE as EOOX_FIELD_CODE, EOTE.EOTE_FIELD_NAME as EOOX_FIELD_NAME, EOTE.EOTE_FIELD_NAME_EN as EOOX_FIELD_NAME_EN, EOTE.EOTE_FIELD_TYPE_CODE as EOOX_FIELD_TYPE_CODE, EOTE.EOTE_FIELD_TYPE_NAME as EOOX_FIELD_TYPE_NAME, EOTE.EOTE_FIELD_PARAMETER as EOOX_FIELD_PARAMETER, EOTE.EOTE_REQUIRE as EOOX_REQUIRE, EOTE.EOTE_MODIFIED as EOOX_MODIFIED, EOTE.EOTE_VALUE_CODE as EOOX_VALUE_CODE, EOTE.EOTE_VALUE_NAME as EOOX_VALUE_NAME from EO_TEMPLATE_ORDER_EXTENSION EOTE where 1=1 << AND EOTE.EOTE_EOTO_CODE LIKE :code>> << AND EOTE.ORG_ID =:orgId >>
